title: IUST Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Research Assistant Posts
description: The Islamic University of Science and Technology (IUST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IUST Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education det...
